name: Medieval Designer DEMO for Oculus Quest
name_original: Medieval Designer DEMO for Oculus Quest
description:
In the Demo version of Medieval Designer you can decorate the main menu area of the full game using 100 of the nearly 2000 items found in the full game including.

- Furniture

- Kitchenware

- Containers 

- Bottles 

- Food

- Books 

- Shelves

- Tables

- Wall hangings 

- Miscellaneous

Get the full game here:

https://bigtopgamestudio.itch.io/medieval-designer
